package.name: Translation2
package.description: This class provides an easy way to retrieve all the strings for a multilingual site from a data source (i.e. db). A PEAR::DB, a PEAR::MDB, a PEAR::MDB2 and an experimental gettext container are provided, more containers will follow. It is designed to reduce the number of queries to the db, caching the results when possible. An Admin class is provided to easily manage translations (add/remove a language, add/remove a string).
